elixir.credo.configurationFile.title: Configuration File
elixir.credo.configurationFile.markdownDescription: Configures which configuration file Credo should use. Default is `.credo.exs`. The extension will first look into the project root, then into the `config/` folder

elixir.credo.credoConfiguration.title: Credo Configuration Name
elixir.credo.credoConfiguration.description: Configures the name of the used configuration (Credo supports having multiple configurations).

elixir.credo.executePath.title: Execute Path
elixir.credo.executePath.markdownDescription: Specifies the execute path where mix can be run from, e.g., `/usr/bin/.asdf/shims`

elixir.credo.strictMode.title: Strict Mode
elixir.credo.strictMode.description: Specifies whether to activate Credo's strict mode

elixir.credo.checksWithTag.title: Checks With Tag
elixir.credo.checksWithTag.markdownDescription:
Only include checks that match the given tag. This setting takes precedence over `#elixir.credo.checksWithoutTag#`.

(see [Credo Docs](https://hexdocs.pm/credo/check_params.html#tags))

elixir.credo.checksWithoutTag.title: Checks Without Tag
elixir.credo.checksWithoutTag.markdownDescription:
Ignore checks that match the given tag. This setting is overridden by `#elixir.credo.checksWithTag#`.

(see [Credo Docs](https://hexdocs.pm/credo/check_params.html#tags))

elixir.credo.ignoreWarningMessages.title: Ignore Warning Messages
elixir.credo.ignoreWarningMessages.markdownDescription: Ignore messages like `Found multiple files ...`, `.. file does not exist. Ignoring ...`

elixir.credo.lintEverything.title: Lint Everything
elixir.credo.lintEverything.markdownDescription: Lint every Elixir file, regardless of your `.credo.exs` config

elixir.credo.enableDebug.title: Enable Debug Mode
elixir.credo.enableDebug.description: Enable extensive logging to the output channel

elixir.credo.diffMode.enabled.title: Enable Credo Diff Mode
elixir.credo.diffMode.enabled.markdownDescription:
Enable Credo's [diff mode](https://hexdocs.pm/credo/diff_command.html) against a [merge base](https://hexdocs.pm/credo/diff_command.html#from-git-merge-base).

You can specify the merge base in the setting `#elixir.credo.diffMode.mergeBase#`

elixir.credo.diffMode.mergeBase.title: Merge Base for Credo Diff Mode
elixir.credo.diffMode.mergeBase.markdownDescription: Change the [merge base](https://hexdocs.pm/credo/diff_command.html#from-git-merge-base) for Credo's diff mode (e.g., `main`).

scripts.pretest: pnpm run compile && pnpm run lint
